backend/main.mo: Defines an empty Motoko actor with no methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing a task to update email addresses in the frontend project.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Lists short summaries of various frontend source files and their functionality.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining theme variables, dark mode colors, and base styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that sets metadata, favicon, root div, and loads the main React script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main SPA router component that renders pages based on path and handles navigation and history state.
frontend/src/components/AdPlaceholder.ts: Stub component that intentionally renders nothing to avoid reintroducing ads.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: React error boundary that catches runtime errors and displays a user-friendly fallback UI.
frontend/src/components/tools/LoadingInd: Simple loading spinner component with optional status text.
Layout wrapper for tool pages providing title, description, action buttons, loading state, and results UI.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages the backend actor based on Internet Identity state using React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Authentication hook and provider managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and status.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind stylesheet defining OKLCH-based theme variables and base typography.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React entry point that sets up QueryClient, InternetIdentityProvider, and renders the app.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Displays an About page describing SankalpHubâ€™s mission, offerings, and privacy practices using styled cards.
frontend/src/pages/AllToolsPage.tsx: Renders a grid of all available tools with icons, descriptions, and navigation handlers.
frontend/src/pages/CalculatorsPage.tsx: Shows a categorized list of calculators with icons and routes for navigation.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Provides contact information, including email and support details, inside styled card sections.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Implements the home screen with a hero banner, tool category navigation, and feature highlights.
frontend/src/pages/ImageToolsPage.tsx: Lists image-related tools like compression, resizing, and format conversion with navigation support.
frontend/src/pages/PdfToolsPage.tsx: Displays available PDF utilities such as merge, split, compress, and convert with clickable cards.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPolicyPage.tsx: Shows the privacy policy with sections explaining data handling, security, cookies, and policy updates.
frontend/src/pages/TermsPage.tsx: Displays the Terms of Service with sections covering agreements, service use rules, warranties, liability limits, and updates.
frontend/src/pages/tools/calculators/Age: Provides an age calculator where users enter their birthdate and get age results in years, months, and days.
frontend/src/pages/tools/calculators/Bmi: Implements a BMI calculator that accepts height and weight to compute BMI and display its category.
frontend/src/pages/tools/calculators/Emi: Calculates EMI, total payment, and total interest for a loan based on principal, rate, and tenure inputs.
frontend/src/pages/tools/calculators/Gst: Offers a GST calculator supporting add or remove mode to compute GST amount and final totals.
frontend/src/pages/tools/calculators/Loa: Computes monthly payment, total payment, and interest for a loan using amount, interest rate, and tenure.
frontend/src/pages/tools/calculators/Per: UI for calculating percentage values and percentage change using user inputs and utility functions.
frontend/src/pages/tools/calculators/Sip: SIP calculator page that computes maturity value, invested amount, and gains using user inputs and displays formatted results.
frontend/src/pages/tools/image/ImageComp: Image compression tool that lets users upload an image, adjust quality, compress it, and download the reduced file.
frontend/src/pages/tools/image/ImageConv: Image format converter allowing uploads and conversion between JPEG, PNG, and WebP with download support.
frontend/src/pages/tools/image/ImageResi: Image resizer that adjusts dimensions with optional aspect-ratio maintenance and provides a downloadable resized image.
frontend/src/pages/tools/image/JpgToPngP: Simple JPG/JPEG to PNG converter that validates input, performs conversion, and enables downloading the PNG file.
frontend/src/pages/tools/image/PngToJpgP: React page for uploading a PNG file, converting it to JPG, and downloading the result.
frontend/src/pages/tools/pdf/CompressPdf: UI for uploading a PDF, compressing it using a utility function, and downloading the compressed file with a summary.
frontend/src/pages/tools/pdf/ImageToPdfP: Allows selecting multiple images, converting them into a single PDF, and downloading the generated file.
frontend/src/pages/tools/pdf/JpgToPdfPag: Uses ToolShell to convert JPG/JPEG images into a PDF, handle errors, and provide a downloadable output.
frontend/src/pages/tools/pdf/PdfMergePag: ToolShell-based interface for selecting and merging multiple PDFs into one, with result summary and download.
frontend/src/pages/tools/pdf/PdfSplitPag: ToolShell UI for selecting a PDF and extracting a page range into a new file, with validation and download.
frontend/src/pages/tools/pdf/PdfToImageP: React page for uploading a PDF, converting it to images via pdfToImage, and downloading the result.
frontend/src/routes.ts: Defines constant route paths for all site pages and tools.
frontend/src/utils/calculators.ts: Provides calculation utilities for age, GST, EMI, loan, and BMI with validation and results.
frontend/src/utils/download.ts: Utility for triggering Blob downloads and generating timestamped filenames.
frontend/src/utils/format.ts: Formatting helpers for byte sizes, numbers, and percentage reduction.
frontend/src/utils/image.ts: Image utilities for loading, compressing, resizing, and converting between JPG and PNG formats.
frontend/src/utils/pdf.ts: Demo PDF utilities for creating, merging, splitting, compressing, and converting PDFs using placeholder output.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom colors, typography, layout, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines current project state, requirements, constraints, and known issues for updating and expanding SankalpHub. Specifies functional expectations for tools, branding rules, calculators to add, and conflicts to resolve.
